#summary List of used 3rd party components and frameworks
#labels Developer

The Choosel Mashup Framework includes and uses the following software components developed by various people and organizations:

||Google Web Toolkit (GWT)||Web application framework||2.0.3||http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/||Apache License 2.0||
||Mockito||Testing with mock objects ||1.8.2||http://mockito.org/||MIT License||
||GWT Log||Logging framework for GWT||3.0.1||http://code.google.com/p/gwt-log/||Apache License 2.0||
||FlexViz||Graph Visualization Component||Custom Build||http://sourceforge.net/projects/flexviz/||Mozilla Public License 1.1 (MPL 1.1)||
||Simile Timeline||Timeline Component||* 2.3.0||http://code.google.com/p/simile-widgets/||New BSD License||
||Simile Ajax API||Required for Simile Timeline integration||* 2.2.0||http://code.google.com/p/simile-widgets/||New BSD License||
||Gin||Dependency injection for GWT||* 20091021||http://code.google.com/p/google-gin/||Apache License 2.0||
||Guice||Dependency injection framework, required for Gin||* 2.0||http://code.google.com/p/google-guice/||Apache License 2.0||
||GWT DnD||Drag and Drop functionality||* 3.0.0||http://code.google.com/p/gwt-dnd/||Apache License 2.0||

||GWT Maps||Google Maps API||* 1.0||http://code.google.com/p/gwt-google-apis/||Apache License 2.0||
||GWT 2 SWF||Flash/Flex integration into GWT||* 0.6.0||http://code.google.com/p/gwt2swf/||Apache License 2.0||
||GWT Query||JQuery functionality within GWT||* 1.0-PATCHED||http://code.google.com/p/gwtquery/||MIT License||
||Apache Xalan||Server-side XSLT Processor||* 2.7.1||http://xml.apache.org/xalan-j/||Apache License 2.0||
||Sarissa||Client-side XSLT Processor||* 0.9.9.4||http://dev.abiss.gr/sarissa/||Apache License 2.0||
